name: NightSky
desc: Custom configuration for Awesome WM.

name: Lunar
desc: Program for deobfusctaion of JVM decompiled bytecode, relying on Fernflower and code structure based mapping format.

name: Math
desc: Library for n-dimensional vector and matrix calculation
Math library has everything glm for C++ allows, but it also has constructors and initialization methods not standardly used for games.
Its made for Kotlin but works just as well with Java and is practical in both languages due to many utility functions.

name: ArgLib
desc: Argument management library with primary focus on simplicity of configuration.

name: review-heatmap
desc: Fork of original review-heatmap customised to look neat with dark Anki theme.

name: NoteStream
desc: Android application for streaming YouTube and playing local music.
NoteStream supports creating mixed playlists, downloading individual songs from YouTube as well as entire playlists and much more.

name: AlarmClock
desc: Simple alarm clock manager app.

name: ParadoxGenerator
desc: Random string generator completely configurable through XML, supporting templates, internal functions, localization and containing a plethora of internal random string, number, format, date generators.

name: FlowAPI
desc: API for managing flow of abstract packets of abstract data in a nodal network.
It was originally designed as a Minecraft power API but it helps with transfer of any form of data for both Minecraft (items, fluids, magic, ...) and for other programs.
It also helps with handling object conversion and supplies several useful classes which make collaboration much easier.

name: Kson
desc: Library simplifying JSON serialization and deserialization of Kotlin objects (singleton classes).

name: Crawler
desc: Web regex search engine/crawler.

name: feh
desc: Modified version of feh with added support for JSON configuration files.

name: SmartFloodFill MCEdit Filter
desc: Flood fill filter for MCEdit taking into account obstacles.

name: Bow Engine
desc: LWJGL2 OpenGL rendering engine.

name: Enigma
desc: Tool for deobfusctaion of Java bytecode.
